tasks.pty: SECRET_KEY=ytd1ff DB_PASSWORD=ytd1ff NO_COLOR=true deno run --allow-all --watch index.js
tasks.noreg: SECRET_KEY=ytd1ff DB_PASSWORD=ytd1ff ALLOW_REGISTRATION=false deno run --allow-all --watch index.js
tasks.unrestricted: SECRET_KEY=ytd1ff DB_PASSWORD=ytd1ff RESTRICT_FILENAMES=false MAX_FILENAME_LENGTH=240 deno run --allow-all --watch index.js
tasks.cookies: SECRET_KEY=ytd1ff DB_PASSWORD=ytd1ff COOKIES_FILE=cookie_secret.txt deno run --allow-all --watch index.js
tasks.proxy: SECRET_KEY=ytd1ff DB_PASSWORD=ytd1ff PROXY_STRING_FILE=proxy_string.txt deno run --allow-all --watch index.js
